Welcome to the Rheophysics of Soft Matter group at Wenzhou Institute, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences

   

Open Postdoctoral Positions

Postdoc Positions are available in the Rheophysics of Soft Matter group at Wenzhou Institute, UCAS. Please see here


News

  • 2024
    • May Our semiflexible rod rheology paper has been published by Macromolecules.
    • April Joint Research and Exchange Arrangement between Laboratoire Interdisciplinaire de Physique (Université Grenoble Alpes & CNRS) and WIUCAS.
    • SPH simulation work with a DST model was published as Featured Articles in Physics of Fluids
    • Our work on a ridge instability was published in Physics of Fluids and featured in Editors’ Picks.
  • 2023
    • Nov. Our lab got ARES-G2 (rheometor)
    • May Our paper about colloidal gelation with non-sticky particles is out in Nature Communications. Featured in Editors’ Highlights
  • 2022
    • Oct. Our odd viscosity paper is out now on Frontiers in Physics.
  • 2022
    • Mar. Review paper `The physics of dense suspensions’ was published in Annual Review of Condensed Matter Physics
  • 2021
    • Dec. New paper with Zhiyuan (open access)
    • Sep. New paper on shear jamming fluid model was published in Phys. Rev. Lett.

Wenzhou Institute, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (国科温州研究院)
